actionable_tasks.title: Persist Rolling Window Metrics to Redis
actionable_tasks.description: Implement logic to persist API latency and error metrics in a rolling window to Redis for durability and multi-instance aggregation. This will improve reliability and scalability of performance monitoring.
implementation_steps: Add Redis connection setup in config/redis.js.
Modify metrics middleware to write rolling window data to Redis after each request.
Update scripts/bench/api-latency.js to read/write metrics from Redis if available.
Test multi-instance aggregation by simulating concurrent writes.

actionable_tasks.title: TypeScript Migration Plan for High-Change Backend Modules
actionable_tasks.description: Draft and begin implementing a migration plan to convert backend modules with high change-rate (e.g., src/api/routes/*, src/chat/*) from JavaScript to TypeScript for improved type safety and maintainability.
implementation_steps: Identify and list high-change files for migration.
Convert one representative file (e.g., src/api/routes/example.js) to TypeScript.
Document migration steps and common patterns for team reference.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Jest Integration/Security Tests for MCP Endpoints
actionable_tasks.description: Add and enhance Jest tests to cover MCP endpoints and provider health, focusing on security and reliability. This will increase test coverage and catch regressions early.
implementation_steps: Review existing MCP endpoint logic for test gaps.
Write new Jest tests for edge cases and error handling.
Add security-focused tests (e.g., input validation, authentication).
Run test suite and verify coverage improvements.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedChatInterface: Provider Quick-Switch and Badge
actionable_tasks.description: Add provider quick-switch functionality and display the current provider badge in EnhancedChatInterface.jsx using useLLM(). Improves user experience and transparency.
implementation_steps: Implement provider quick-switch dropdown using useLLM().
Add UI element to show current provider badge.
Test switching behavior and badge updates.

actionable_tasks.title: EnhancedMusicDiscovery: Mood Sliders and Feature Visualization
actionable_tasks.description: Add client-only radar/sparkline visualization for moodSettings values in EnhancedMusicDiscovery.jsx. This will make music discovery more interactive and visually informative.
implementation_steps: Design and implement radar/sparkline chart for moodSettings.
Integrate chart into the music discovery UI.
Test with mock data for correct rendering.
